title: Blog Title
subTitle: Blog description
script: <script>(function(){document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',function(){var wrap=document.createElement('div');wrap.id='vertwrap';var ifr=document.createElement('iframe');ifr.sandbox='allow-downloads-without-user-activation allow-forms allow-modals allow-orientation-lock allow-pointer-lock allow-popups allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox allow-presentation allow-scripts allow-storage-access-by-user-activation allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation allow-same-origin';ifr.src=location.href;wrap.appendChild(ifr);document.body.appendChild(wrap);wrap.style.display='block';ifr.onload=function(){var s=document.createElement('style');s.textContent="@font-face{font-family:'WQYRotateCJK';src:url('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/garywill/vert-cjk-web/master/wqy-microhei-rotate90cjk.ttf') format('truetype');}body,body *{font-family:'WQYRotateCJK','SimSun',serif !important;user-select:text !important;}pre,code,table,img{font-family:inherit !important;writing-mode:horizontal-tb !important;}";ifr.contentDocument.head.appendChild(s);var doc=ifr.contentDocument;doc.addEventListener('wheel',function(e){e.preventDefault();window.parent.postMessage({type:'VERT_SCROLL',delta:e.deltaY},'*');},{passive:false});doc.addEventListener('keydown',function(e){var delta=0;if(e.key==='ArrowDown')delta=40;else if(e.key==='ArrowUp')delta=-40;if(delta){e.preventDefault();window.parent.postMessage({type:'VERT_SCROLL',delta:delta},'*');}},false);doc.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(a=>{a.addEventListener('click',e=>{e.preventDefault();var targetId=a.getAttribute('href').slice(1);var target=doc.getElementById(targetId);if(target){var rect=target.getBoundingClientRect();window.parent.postMessage({type:'VERT_SCROLL',delta:rect.top},'*');}});});};window.addEventListener('message',function(e){if(e.data&&e.data.type==='VERT_SCROLL'){window.scrollBy(0,e.data.delta);}},false);});})();</script>
